comments.body: Should you keep `(or press enter to use %s)`?

`click.prompt` displays the default in brackets after the prompt, so the new prompt looks like this:

```
Enter the primary author in the format of "name <email>" [jlowin <jlowin@apache.org>]: 
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +202,206 @@        primary_author = click.prompt(
            click.style(
                'Enter the primary author in the format of \"name <email>\"',
                fg='blue', bold=True),
            default=distinct_authors[0])
